description: Retrieves information about all the message templates that are associated with your Amazon Pinpoint account.

nested_items.name: TemplatesResponse
nested_items.description: Provides information about all the message templates that are associated with your Amazon Pinpoint account.

nested_items.name: Item
nested_items.description: An array of responses, one for each message template that's associated with your Amazon Pinpoint account and meets any filter criteria that you specified in the request.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the message template. This value isn't included in a TemplateResponse object. To retrieve the ARN of a template, use the GetEmailTemplate, GetPushTemplate, GetSmsTemplate, or GetVoiceTemplate operation, depending on the type of template that you want to retrieve the ARN for.

nested_items.name: CreationDate
nested_items.description: The date, in ISO 8601 format, when the message template was created.

nested_items.name: DefaultSubstitutions
nested_items.description: The JSON object that specifies the default values that are used for message variables in the message template. This object isn't included in a TemplateResponse object. To retrieve this object for a template, use the GetEmailTemplate, GetPushTemplate, GetSmsTemplate, or GetVoiceTemplate operation, depending on the type of template that you want to retrieve the object for.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedDate
nested_items.description: The date, in ISO 8601 format, when the message template was last modified.

nested_items.name: TemplateDescription
nested_items.description: The custom description of the message template. This value isn't included in a TemplateResponse object. To retrieve the description of a template, use the GetEmailTemplate, GetPushTemplate, GetSmsTemplate, or GetVoiceTemplate operation, depending on the type of template that you want to retrieve the description for.

nested_items.name: TemplateName
nested_items.description: The name of the message template.

nested_items.name: TemplateType
nested_items.description: The type of channel that the message template is designed for. Possible values are: EMAIL, PUSH, SMS, INAPP, and VOICE.

nested_items.name: Version
nested_items.description: The unique identifier, as an integer, for the active version of the message template.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The string to use in a subsequent request to get the next page of results in a paginated response. This value is null if there are no additional pages.
